name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Split Screen in Tab - ChatGPT Sidebar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Split View in One Tab! Multitask with ChatGPT Sidebar!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why install?
🌟 Seamless ChatGPT experience
🌟 Take notes while browsing
🌟 Compare documents without switching between tabs
🌟 Gather information from multiple sources while creating content
🌟 Monitor multiple stocks or cryptocurrencies simultaneously
🌟 More...

Features
🌟 Side Panel: Open ChatGPT for a seamless AI experience (writing, email replies, image generation, etc.).
🌟 Layout: Horizontal, Vertical, and Custom Drag & Resize layouts.
🌟 Group: Store websites and open them quickly in a tab, like for multiple social media postings.
🌟 Context Menu: Right-click to open the Side Panel, Group, or Template.
🌟 Shortcut: "Ctrl+Shift+S" to open the Side Panel. (Changeable in FAQs.)
🌟 Import Tabs: Quickly import opened tabs
🌟 Open link in Side Panel: right click the link and select the context menu.
🌟 Auto Refresh: Set the time to auto refresh (etc, stock group).


FAQs
🤔Is It Free?
-- Free Tier already Covers Most Needs.😊💖
-- Upgrade to Pro for more Custom Groups. Go Pro and help us build even more features!💪✨

🤔Change Shortcut⌨️
-- Use the shortcut button on the top toolbar to manage more.
-- Mac shortcut: Command+Shift+S

🤔Security Testing🛡️
-- Here is a link to test that iframe won't be globally cross-origin when using this extension: https://tools.wow2fun.com/splitScreen
Normally, you will see 'chatgpt.com' refuse to connect, which indicates enhanced security enforced by the browser.

🤔Need More Help?
-- Click the "Visit support hub" below or email me.

📝If you’re happy with our service, please consider leaving us a review below!⭐
Your feedback helps us improve and supports our growth🌱. Thank you!🤝
